casebody.data:
The ESTATE OF Luis Carlos TAVARES and Paula Pires, His Wife, Serving as Administratrix Ad Prosequendum of the Estate of Luis Carlos Tavares, Plaintiff
v.
LUCAS CONSTRUCTION GROUP, INC., Frederic R. Harris, Inc., DMJM + Harris, Inc., DMJM Harris/AECOM, and AECOM, Defendants-Respondents,
and
County of Middlesex, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
Lionel Lucas, Antonio Lucas, Consolidated Rail Corporation, Township of Woodbridge, and Tradewinds Construction, Inc., Defendants. C-315 September Term 2018
081489 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 16, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005272-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
